name: Shorty on Time
description:
Play as Short the Elf in his job on the assembly line at Santa's Workshop.  Assemble toys good enough to make the cut and before time is up!

Controls:  Just drag and drop toy parts and tools shown in the toolbar to connect them.  (Note:  While dragging, use the mouse will to rotate the part.)

Note:  I only had time to make one toy type - the robot, so the game very short.
